version_description:
-New iOS 7 user interface
-Supports PDF merging
-Improves scanning process
-Minor bug fixes

- Supports creating folders
- Minor bug fixes

- Adds French, German, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish localisations.
- Minor bug fixes.
- Improves compatibility with iOS7
- Minor bug fixes

- Adds color mode scanning
- Minor bug fixes

- Optimizes with iOS 8
- Minor bug fixes

- Optimizes for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
- Supports OneDrive and iCloud Drive
- Works inside Photos app (iOS8 only)
- Minor bug fixes

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Applied entirely redesigned document processing engine. Documents you scanned will be more rapidly processed and in better quality. Also, you are now able to adjust the brightness and contrast.
- Added a greatly expected feature that editing previously saved documents is now supported.
- Added a feature that moving and deleting pages are now supported when viewing the entire document.
- Added a feature that one-tap Select All is supported when multi-selecting documents.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.
- Minor bug fixes

Introducing brand-new Tiny Scanner 5.0. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Empowered and fastered scan experience;
- Redesigned a much simpler way of organizing scans;
- Deeply optimized Tiny Scanner for iPhone XS and iOS 12.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Introducing brand-new Tiny Scanner 5.0. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Empowered and fastered scan experience;
- Redesigned a much simpler way of organizing scans;

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Introducing Tiny Scanner 5.1. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Redesigned a more efficient way of organizing scans;
- Redesigned a much simpler sharing interface.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Introducing Tiny Scanner 5.1.1. Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Optimized the scan frame to the ratio of 4:3. What you see is now what you get;
- Preset the default document size to A4.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Introducing "Batch Processing". When scanning or importing a document with hundreds of pages (like a book), you are now able to efficiently apply identical filters or skip "Border Detection" to the entire document at a time.
- Adjusted the "Page Size" Setting. You can now rapidly change the exporting PDF document size by the "A4" (default) button on the right top side of the document edit page.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Other than minor bug fixes and improvements, we also:
- Applied entirely redesigned document processing engine. Documents you scanned will be more rapidly processed and in better quality. Also, you are now able to adjust the brightness and contrast.
- Added a greatly expected feature that editing previously saved documents is now supported.
- Added a feature that moving and deleting pages are now supported when viewing the entire document.
- Added a feature that one-tap Select All is supported when multi-selecting documents.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

(Upgrade to Pro Plan to remove the limitation.)

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

Introducing the brand-new Premium Plan of Tiny Scanner.
AI Powered OCR is now part of Tiny Scanner. It makes Tiny Scanner even more powerful than ever before.
And also, for starters who have used Tiny Scanner for a quite short time, the help bubbles and FAQ are there for your reference.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.

We keep enhancing your experience with plenty of performance improvements which you may not necessarily notice.

We'd love to hear your feedback! If you have any ideas or feature requests for future versions of the app, feel free to let us know. Please reach out to us at tinyscan@appxy.com.
